name: Asko
description: Asko brings innovative dApps to the forefront of DeFi. Our impactful and effective solutions bridge the gap between what is thought to be possible and impossible in DeFi. Over time, Asko DAO intends to consistently produce exciting and profitable dApps, the profits of which are distributed to Asko DAO stakers, and the Asko DAO to continue producing dApps.
